Scripts.OnTextChanged: local scrollBar = getglobal(self:GetParent():GetName().."ScrollBar") self:GetParent():UpdateScrollChildRect() local min,max = scrollBar:GetMinMaxValues() if (max > 0 and (self.max ~= max)) then self.max = max scrollBar:SetValue(max) end

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: Pop up history on incoming message

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: Pop up history on own message
